DOC.brief_summary: This study exploratory randomize control trial ( RCT ) group psychological intervention postnatal depression British mother 's south Asian origin . The hypothesis depress British woman South Asian origin receive group intervention show significant improvement term severity depression compare treatment usual ( TAU ) control group .
